name: For My Comrades, Rimuru
text: 【AUTO】 When your other character's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, choose 1 of your 《Demon Continent》 characters, and that character gets +500 power until end of turn. 【ACT】 Brainstorm [(1) 【REST】 this card] Flip over 4 cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. For each climax revealed among those cards, search your deck for up to 1 《Demon Continent》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
flavorText: You guys fall back and rest for a bit.

name: "Decapitating Demon Blade" Shion
text: 【CONT】 If all of your characters are 《Demon Continent》, this card gets +1000 power. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card attacks, if "Decapitating Demon Blade" is in your climax area, and you have 4 or more other 《Demon Continent》 characters, you may choose 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.

name: Inherited Form, Rimuru
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand or by the 【CXCOMBO】 effect of "Inherited Form, Rimuru", you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 [(3) Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room & Put this card into your memory] At the end of this card's attack, if "Nameless Story" is in your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, put the top 2 cards of your deck into your waiting room. If all those cards are 《Demon Continent》 characters or yellow climax, you may choose 1 character in your waiting room, and put it on the stage position that this card was on.
flavorText: Shizu-san entrusted everything to me as someone from the same homeland.

name: Case Complete, Rimuru
text: 【CONT】 All of your other 《Demon Continent》 characters get +500 power. 【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to 1 "Fruits of Wisdom", reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
flavorText: Gotcha.

name: This Belongs to Me! Shion
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, put the top 2 cards of your deck into your waiting room. If there is a climax among those cards, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +1500 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, choose 1 of your 《Demon Continent》 characters, and that character gets +1500 power until end of turn.

name: Drawn-Out Battle, Rimuru
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, all players perform the following action. "If your memory has 5 or more cards, choose 4 cards in your memory, and put all cards in your memory except those cards from your memory into your waiting room." 【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 level 0 or lower character in your waiting room, and put it on any position of your stage.
flavorText: An all-out attack managed 3-%... This is looking bad.

name: Savant, Hakurou
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your 《Demon Continent》 characters in front of this card get +X power. X is equal to that character's level ×500. 【AUTO】 When your character's trigger check reveals a yellow climax, if there are 1 or less markers underneath this card, you may choose 1 card in your waiting room, and put it face up underneath this card as a marker. 【ACT】 [(1) Put 2 markers underneath this card into your waiting room] Choose 1 yellow card in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavorText: Ho, ho, ho... Excellent work, Great Rimuru.

name: Secretary and Bodyguard, Shion
text: 【CONT】 This card gets +1000 power for each of your other 《Demon Continent》 characters. 【AUTO】 Encore [Put 1 character from your hand into your waiting room] (When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return this card to its previous stage position as 【REST】)
flavorText: Now then, let us go, Great Rimuru. Our lunch will get cold.

name: Cool Beauty, Shion
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand or by the 【AUTO】 effect of "Chance to Perform, Ranga", this card gets +4500 power and the following ability until the end of your opponent's next turn. "【CONT】 During this card's battle, all players cannot play "Backup" from their hand." 【AUTO】 [(1) Put 1 《Demon Continent》 character from your hand into your waiting room] When this card attacks, if you have another 《Demon Continent》 character, you may pay the cost. If you do, put the top card of your clock into your waiting room.

name: Great Sword Wielder, Shion
text: 【AUTO】 [Put 1 climax from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to 1 《Demon Continent》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.

name: "Icicle Lance" Eren
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, look at up to 2 cards from the top of your deck, and put them on the top of your deck in any order. 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if you have 1 or less other characters, you may put the top card of your deck into your waiting room. If that card is a level 0 or lower character, put that character on any position of your back stage.
flavorText: Icicle Lance!

name: Flash, Hakurou
text: 【CONT】 You cannot play event cards or "Backup" from your hand. 【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may put that character into your opponent's stock. If you do, put the bottom card of your opponent's stock into their waiting room.

name: Reproach, Rimuru
text: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, this card gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of other 《Demon Continent》 characters you have ×1000.
flavorText: No!

name: Misunderstanding, Rimuru
text: 【CONT】 If you have 4 or more 《Demon Continent》 characters, this card gets -1 level while in your hand. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 [Put 1 "Reliable Existence" from your climax area into your waiting room] At the end of this card's attack, if you have 4 or more other 《Demon Continent》 characters, you may pay the cost. If you do, look at up to 2 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 2 《Demon Continent》 characters from among them, reveal them to your opponent, put them into your hand, put the rest into your waiting room, choose up to 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavorText: Listen, this guy seems to have business with you.

name: Magnificent Swordwork, Hakurou
text: 【CONT】 If "For My Comrades, Rimuru" is in your clock, this card gets -1 level while in your hand. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, draw up to 2 cards, choose 2 cards in your hand, put them into your waiting room, and put up to 1 card from the top of your deck into your stock. 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, choose 1 of your 《Demon Continent》 characters, and that character gets +1500 power until end of turn.

name: 3 Rules, Rimuru
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +500 power. 【ACT】 [【REST】 this card] If you do not have a marker underneath this card, choose 1 《Demon Continent》 character in your waiting room, and put it face up underneath this card as a marker. 【ACT】 [(1) 【REST】 this card] Return 1 marker from underneath this card to your hand.
flavorText: There are three rules. I'd like you to uphold them, at the very least.

name: Prankster, Ramiris
text: 【ACT】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room & Put this card into your waiting room] If you have another 《Demon Continent》 character, choose 1 of your opponent's characters, and move it to another open position of their stage.

name: Threat to Survival, Rimuru
flavorText: I don't really get it, but okay!

name: Unsettling Atmosphere, Shion
text: 【CONT】 All of your opponent's characters get "【AUTO】 Encore [(2)]".
flavorText: Who's there?!

name: Simple Task Before Dinner, Hakurou
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a 《Demon Continent》 character, this card gets +1 soul until end of turn. (Return the revealed card to its original place) 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if this card's battle opponent is cost 0 or lower, you may put that character into your opponent's stock. If you do, put the bottom card of your opponent's stock into their waiting room.
flavorText: A task simple enough to achieve before breakfast... or dinner, in this case.

name: Promise? Shion
text: 【CONT】 If there are 2 or more markers underneath this card, this card gets "【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +1000 power." 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, put all face up "Threat to Survival, Rimuru" in your marker areas and waiting room face up underneath this card in any order as markers.
flavorText: Oh, dear.

name: Capable Lady, Shion
text: 【AUTO】 When you use this card's "Backup", if all of your characters are 《Demon Continent》, you may put the top card of your deck into your stock. 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 2000, Level 1 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose 1 of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +2000 power until end of turn)

name: Basking in Sunset, Geld
text: 【CONT】 This card gets +1000 power for each of your other 《Demon Continent》 characters in your back stage. 【AUTO】 [Put this card into your waiting room] When your other 《Demon Continent》 character is frontal attacked, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 of your characters in battle, and that character gets +4000 power until end of turn.

name: First Friend
text: Look at your memory and marker areas, choose up to 1 card from among them, and return it to your hand.

name: Sleep Mode
text: 【COUNTER】 If you do not have a 《Demon Continent》 character, this card cannot be played from your hand. Choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets the following ability until end of turn. "【CONT】 This card cannot become 【REVERSE】."

name: Decapitating Demon Blade
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【CHOICE】: When this card triggers, you may choose a character with 【SOUL】 in its trigger icon in your waiting room, and return it to your hand or put it into your stock)

name: Nameless Story
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【CHOICE】: When this card triggers, you may choose a character with 【SOUL】 in its trigger icon in your waiting room, and return it to your hand or put it into your stock)

name: Reliable Existence
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【RETURN】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 of your opponent's characters, and return it to his or her hand)
flavorText: You could at least rely on me at a time like this.

name: It's Delicious! Milim
text: 【CONT】 If all of your characters are 《Demon Continent》, this card gets +2000 power. 【AUTO】 At the beginning of your opponent's attack phase, you may move this card to an open position of your center stage with a character facing this card.
flavorText: Nom♡

name: Swept Along, Rimuru
text: 【CONT】 This card cannot side attack. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card attacks, if "A Historical Moment" is in your climax area, and you have another 《Demon Continent》 character, during that attack, perform a trigger check 2 times on the trigger step.

name: Full of Smiles, Shuna
text: 【CONT】 If you have 4 or more 《Demon Continent》 characters, this card gets -1 level while in your hand. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if you have another 《Demon Continent》 character, this card gets +2000 power until the end of your opponent's next turn.
flavorText: Of course! Leave it to me!

name: "Drago Buster" Milim
text: 【CONT】 If all of your characters are 《Demon Continent》, this card gets +2000 power. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When "Recently Learned Restraint" is placed on your climax area, this card gets the following 2 abilities until end of turn. "【AUTO】 [(2)] When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose up to 1 "Drago Buster" in your hand, and if the level and color requirements are fulfilled, play it without paying the cost." "【AUTO】 [(2)] When this card direct attacks, you may pay the cost. If you do, deal 2 damage to your opponent." (Damage may be canceled)
flavorText: This is what you call "restraint"!

name: Meditating? Milim
text: 【ACT】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room & Put this card into your waiting room] If you have another ""Drago Buster" Milim", look at up to 3 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 card from among them, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room. 【ACT】 Brainstorm [(1) 【REST】 this card] Flip over 4 cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. For each climax revealed among those cards, choose up to 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.

name: "Destroyer" Milim
text: 【CONT】 During your turn, if you have another 《Demon Continent》 character, this card gets +3000 power. 【AUTO】 [(1)] When this card attacks, you may pay the cost. If you do, during that attack, perform a trigger check 2 times on the trigger step.
flavorText: Hehehe. Oh, you want to play with me?

name: Towards the Dwelling of Spirits, Rimuru
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, look at the top card of your deck, and put it on the top of your deck or into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 [Return this card to your hand] When your climax is placed on your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +2000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: Shizu-san, I swear I'm going to save these kids.

name: In a Meeting, Shuna
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, this card gets +1500 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 [(1) Put the top card of your deck into your clock] When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 《Demon Continent》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavorText: Great Rimuru, what shall we do?

name: Sweet Beauty, Shuna
text: 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, if "Delightful Cheek-Rubbing" is in your climax area, put up to 1 card from the top of your deck into your stock, and reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a 《Demon Continent》 character, put it into your hand. (Otherwise, return it to its original place) 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if this card's battle opponent is level 1 or lower, you may 【REVERSE】 that character.

name: Warm Welcome, Rimuru
text: 【CONT】 If you have 2 or more other 《Demon Continent》 characters, this card gets +2000 power. 【AUTO】 Encore [(1) Put 1 character from your stage into your waiting room] (When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return this card to its previous stage position as 【REST】)
flavorText: Wha?!

name: Leave It to Me! Milim
text: 【CONT】 This card gets +2000 power for each of your other 《Demon Continent》 characters in your back stage. 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, look at the top card of your deck, and put it on the top of your deck or into your waiting room.
flavorText: Heh, heh, heh. Haven't you forgotten something important?

name: I Can't Hear You? Rimuru
text: 【CONT】 This card gets +500 power for each of your other 《Demon Continent》 characters. 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, choose up to 1 card in your opponent's waiting room, and put it on the top or at the bottom of their deck.
flavorText: What? No response?

name: Benimaru Breaking the Enemy's Formation
text: 【CONT】 All of your other 《Demon Continent》 characters get +1500 power. 【AUTO】 [(2)] When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may pay the cost. If you do, deal 1 damage to your opponent. (Damage may be canceled)

name: Battle in the Goblin's Village, Rimuru
text: 【AUTO】 [(1) Put 1 《Demon Continent》 character from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, look at up to 4 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 card from among them, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 【CLOCK】 Shift, Level 0 (At the beginning of your main phase, you may choose a red card in your hand and this card in your clock, and exchange them)
flavorText: It's good that there's no need for fighting anymore. Yep, yep. Nothing beats peace!

name: Multi-Talented, Shuna
text: 【AUTO】 This ability activates up to 1 time per turn. When you use an 【ACT】 ability, choose 1 of your 《Demon Continent》 characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn. 【ACT】 [(1) 【REST】 this card] Look at up to 2 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 level 1 or higher card from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room. (Climax are regarded as level 0)

name: Skillful Consumption, Shizu
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, choose 1 of your level 2 or higher characters, and that character gets +3000 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if this card's battle opponent is level 0 or lower, you may 【REVERSE】 that character.
flavorText: Rimuru: "Eating with her mask on... This girl I'm destined to be with has some skills…"

name: Shuna Watching Over
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, put the top 2 cards of your deck into your waiting room. If there is a level 0 or lower character among those cards, this card's soul does not decrease by side attacking until end of turn. 【AUTO】 [(1) Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 《Demon Continent》 character in your waiting room, return it to your hand, choose 1 of your other 《Demon Continent》 characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn.

name: Mature Tastes, Rimuru
text: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if you have 2 or more other 《Demon Continent》 characters, this card gets +2000 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 [(1)] During your opponent's turn, when this card becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, you may pay the cost. If you do, 【REST】 this card, and at the beginning of your next encore step, put this card into your waiting room.
flavorText: Yes, it's quite good.

name: Great Mood, Benimaru
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, look at the top card of your deck, and put it on the top or at the bottom or your deck. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, this card gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of 《Demon Continent》 characters you have ×500.

name: Capable Lady, Shuna
text: 【AUTO】 When you use this card's "Backup", reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a 《Demon Continent》 character, put it into your hand, choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room. (Otherwise, return it to its original place) 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 2000, Level 1 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose 1 of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +2000 power until end of turn)

name: Awaited Chance to Shine, Milim
text: 【CONT】 If the character facing this card is cost 0 or lower, this card gets +1 level and +3500 power. 【AUTO】 Encore [Put the top card of your deck into your clock] (When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return this card to its previous stage position as 【REST】)
flavorText: Hah-ha!

name: Victory Celebration, Benimaru
text: 【AUTO】 When you use this card's "Backup", choose 1 of your characters in battle, and that character gets the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, put that character into your opponent's memory." 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 3000, Level 2 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose 1 of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +3000 power until end of turn)

name: Taunting the Kids, Rimuru
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your level 3 or higher characters in front of this card get +2000 power. 【ACT】 [(2) Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room & 【REST】 this card] If your level is 3 or higher, choose 1 "Power of a Kijin, Benimaru" or "Benimaru Breaking the Enemy's Formation" in your waiting room, and put it on any position of your stage.
flavorText: Well, who wants to go first?

name: Cute Request, Milim
text: 【CONT】 This card gets +1000 power for each of your other 《Demon Continent》 characters. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card attacks, if "I Want to Fight More!" is in your climax area, and you have 2 or more other 《Demon Continent》 characters, look at up to 2 cards from the top of your opponent's deck, choose up to 2 cards from among them, put them on the top of their deck in any order, and put the rest into their waiting room.
flavorText: Rimuru: "Don't give me those puppy dog eyes!"

name: Victory Celebration, Kurobe
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +500 power. 【ACT】 [Put 1 event from your hand into your waiting room & 【REST】 this card] Look at up to 4 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 《Demon Continent》 character from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room.
flavorText: It'll make some nice weapons.

name: Aren't We Besties? Rimuru
text: 【CONT】 All of your other 《Demon Continent》 characters get +500 power. 【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] This ability activates up to 1 time per turn. When your other "Of Course We're Besties! Milim" is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, look at up to 4 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 《Demon Continent》 character from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room.
flavorText: We're besties, so we help each other out, right?

name: Strategy Meeting, Shuna
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, choose 1 of your other 《Demon Continent》 characters, and that character gets +2000 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if your opponent's center stage has 1 or less characters, choose 1 cost 0 or lower character in your opponent's center stage, and put it into their waiting room.

name: Great Victory! Milim
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand or attacks, look at the top card of your deck, and put it on the top of your deck or into your waiting room.
flavorText: Rimuru: "That was some nice restraint."

name: Great Haul! Milim
text: 【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, put the top 2 cards of your deck into your waiting room. If there is a climax among those cards, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand. 【AUTO】 When your other 《Demon Continent》 character attacks, this card gets +1500 power until end of turn.
flavorText: Wa-ha-ha-ha! Another great haul today!

name: Summoning Call, Benimaru
text: 【CONT】 This card gets +500 power for each of your other 《Demon Continent》 characters. 【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room & Put this card into your waiting room] When your other 《Demon Continent》 character is frontal attacked, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 of your characters in battle, and that character gets +3000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: Everyone, utilize all methods at your disposal to attack Charybdis!

name: What That Body Harbors, Shizu
text: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if you have 2 or more other 《Demon Continent》 characters, choose 1 character facing this card, and until end of turn, that character gets -1000 power and this card gets +1000 power.
flavorText: Ugh... Auuugh!

name: Of Course We're Besties! Milim
flavorText: That's true... But... Besties...

name: Distressed, Shuna
text: 【AUTO】 [(1)] When this card frontal attacks, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 of your opponent's characters, and that character gets -1 level until end of turn. 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if this card's battle opponent is level 2 or lower, you may 【REVERSE】 that character.

name: Rimuru Sealing an Agreement
text: 【AUTO】 [(1) Put 1 《Demon Continent》 character from your waiting room at the bottom of your clock] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, return all cards from your waiting room to your deck, shuffle your deck, and this card gets +1500 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if the character facing this card is level 3 or higher, this card gets +6000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: Yeah.

name: Drago Buster
text: If you have a character with "Milim(ミリム)" in its card name, your opponent reveals 7 cards from the top of their deck, shuffles their deck, and puts X cards from the top of their deck into their clock. X is equal to the number of climax among those cards.
flavorText: Now, I'll show you one of mine.

name: Calamity-Class Charybdis
text: Put this card into your memory. 【AUTO】 Memory At the beginning of your main phase, if this card is in your memory, choose 1 card in your waiting room, put it face down into your memory, if your memory has 3 or more face down cards, choose 3 face down cards in your memory, and put them into your waiting room. If you put 3 cards into your waiting room, deal 3 damage to your opponent, and put this card into your waiting room. (Damage may be canceled) 【AUTO】 Memory [(2)] At the beginning of your opponent's main phase, if this card is in your memory, your opponent may pay the cost. If they do, choose 1 face down card in your memory, and put it into your waiting room.

name: A Historical Moment
text: 【AUTO】When this card is placed on your climax area from your hand, perform the【STANDBY】effect. (【STANDBY】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 character with a level equal to or less than your level +1 in your waiting room, and put it on any position of your stage as【REST】)
flavorText: The Jura Tempest Federation!

name: Recently Learned Restraint
text: 【AUTO】When this card is placed on your climax area from your hand, perform the【STANDBY】effect. (【STANDBY】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 character with a level equal to or less than your level +1 in your waiting room, and put it on any position of your stage as【REST】)

name: Delightful Cheek-Rubbing
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on your climax area from your hand, choose up to 1 character with level equal to or lower than your level in your waiting room, return it to your hand, choose up to 2 of your characters, and those characters get +1 soul until end of turn.

name: I Want to Fight More!
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【COMEBACK】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)
flavorText: Hrrmph...

name: User of Ifrit, Shizu
text: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, choose 1 of your other 《Demon Continent》 characters, and that character gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of other 《Demon Continent》 characters you have ×500. 【AUTO】 [(1)] During your opponent's turn, when this card becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, you may pay the cost. If you do, 【REST】 this card, and at the beginning of your next encore step, put this card into your memory.

name: Triumphant Return, Rimuru
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a 《Demon Continent》 character, this card gets +1 level and +1500 power until end of turn. (Return the revealed card to its original place) 【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, choose 1 of your other 《Demon Continent》 characters, 【REST】 it, and move it to an open position of your back stage.
flavorText: I guess it's over.

name: Shizu Resolutely Facing Off
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, search your deck for up to 1 《Demon Continent》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 Memory When this card attacks, if "Conqueror of Flames" is in your climax area, and your memory has 4 or more cards, deal 4 damage to your opponent, and at the beginning of the encore step, put this card into your waiting room. (Damage may be canceled)

name: Rimuru Fresh From a Bath
text: 【CONT】 If there is a marker underneath this card, this card gets +2000 power. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a 《Demon Continent》 character or "Anti-Magic Mask", you may put it face down underneath this card as a marker. (Otherwise, return it to its original position)
flavorText: I think I'm ready for some coffee milk.

name: Mock Battle, Chloe
text: 【AUTO】 [(1) Put 1 《Demon Continent》 character from your hand into your waiting room & Put this card into your memory] When this card becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, you may pay the cost. If you do, look at up to 2 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 card from among them, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room.

name: Destined Person, Shizu
text: 【CONT】 Memory This card gets +1000 power for each "Fruits of Wisdom" in your memory. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card attacks, if "I'm Not a Bad Slime!" is in your climax area, and you have 2 or more other 《Demon Continent》 characters, look at up to 4 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 《Demon Continent》 character from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, put the rest into your waiting room, and you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 "Fruits of Wisdom" in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavorText: Rimuru: "Do you have a minute?"

name: "Tempest Star Wolf" Ranga
text: 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if the level of this card's battle opponent is higher than your opponent's level, you may put that character at the bottom of your opponent's deck.

name: Always by Your Side, Shizu
text: 【CONT】 If your waiting room has 2 or less climax, this card gets -1 level while in your hand. 【CONT】 This card gets +500 power for each of your other 《Demon Continent》 characters in your back stage. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, look at up to X cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 card from among them, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room. X is equal to the number of 《Demon Continent》 characters you have.

name: Shadow in the Darkness, Souei
text: 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card attacks, if "Shadow Squad" is in your climax area, put the top 2 cards of your deck into your waiting room, deal X damage to your opponent, choose up to 3 cards in your opponent's waiting room, return them to their deck, and your opponent shuffles their deck. X is equal to the total number of in the trigger icons of the cards put into your waiting room by this effect. (Damage may be canceled) 【AUTO】 【CLOCK】 Shift, Level 0 (At the beginning of your main phase, you may choose a blue card in your hand and this card in your clock, and exchange them)

name: Cool and Collected, Souei
text: 【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, reveal the top card of your deck, choose 1 level X or lower character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand. X is equal to the level of the revealed card. (Climax are regarded as level 0. Return the revealed card to its original place) 【AUTO】 【CLOCK】 Shift, Level 0 (At the beginning of your main phase, you may choose a blue card in your hand and this card in your clock, and exchange them)

name: Solemn Expression, Rimuru
text: 【CONT】 Your other 《Demon Continent》 character in the middle position of your center stage gets +1500 power. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 [Put 1 ""Orc Lord" Strategy Meeting" from your climax area into your waiting room] At the beginning of your encore step, you may pay the cost. If you do, put up to 3 cards from the top of your deck into your waiting room, choose up to 1 level X or lower 《Demon Continent》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand. X is equal to the number of 《Demon Continent》 characters put into your waiting room by this effect.
flavorText: Hmm...

name: Final Push, Rimuru
text: 【AUTO】 This ability activates up to 1 time per turn. When you use an 【ACT】, this card gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of 《Demon Continent》 characters you have ×500. 【ACT】 [【REST】 1 of your 《Demon Continent》 characters] This card gets the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may put that character at the bottom of your opponent's deck."
flavorText: I know! I'll make a weapon for you!

name: Temporary Retreat, Gobta
text: 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card attacks, if "Great Combination!" is in your climax area, and you have another 《Demon Continent》 character, look at up to 4 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 level 1 or higher card from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room. (Climax are regarded as level 0)
flavorText: Gobta: "Fall back for now!"

name: Taking a Break, Rimuru
text: 【AUTO】 [(1) Put 1 《Demon Continent》 character from your stage into your waiting room] When you use this card's "Backup", you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 of your opponent's characters, and that character gets -1 soul until end of turn. 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 2500, Level 2 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose 1 of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +2500 power until end of turn)
flavorText: I'm taking a break.

name: Truth of the Tale, Shizu
text: 【CONT】 Memory If your memory has 2 or more "Fruits of Wisdom", this card gets "【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +1500 power.". 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may choose 1 "Destined Person, Shizu" in your waiting room, and put it into your stock. 【AUTO】 [Put 1 climax from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 《Demon Continent》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavorText: I have to face him without any chance to prepare...

name: When Push Comes to Shove, Gobta
text: 【CONT】 If all of your characters are 《Demon Continent》, this card gets +1000 power. 【AUTO】 [(1)] At the beginning of your opponent's attack phase, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose this card and 1 of your 《Demon Continent》 characters, and exchange them as 【STAND】.

name: Chance to Perform, Ranga
text: 【CONT】 If your waiting room has 2 or more "Cool Beauty, Shion", this card gets -1 level while in your hand. 【AUTO】 [(1)] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 "Cool Beauty, Shion" in your waiting room, and put it on any position of your stage.

name: To Survive, Souei
text: 【AUTO】 [Put 1 《Demon Continent》 character from your hand into your waiting room] When your character's trigger check reveals a climax with in its trigger icon, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand. 【ACT】 Brainstorm [(1) 【REST】 this card] Flip over 5 cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. For each climax with in its trigger icon revealed among those cards, search your deck for up to 1 《Demon Continent》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
flavorText: Highest chance of survival, eh? In that case, I'll stay, too.

name: Combination With Gobta, Tempest Wolf
text: 【CONT】 All of your other "Temporary Retreat, Gobta" get +1000 power. 【AUTO】 [Put 1 《Demon Continent》 character from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to 1 "Temporary Retreat, Gobta", reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck. 【ACT】 [【REST】 this card] Choose 1 of your 《Demon Continent》 characters, and that character gets +1500 power until end of turn.

name: Within a Blissful Dream, Shizu
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +500 power. 【ACT】 [(1) Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room & 【REST】 this card] Search your deck for up to 1 《Demon Continent》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.

name: Thirst for Revenge, Phobio
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, put the top 2 cards of your deck into your waiting room, and this card gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of 《Demon Continent》 characters among those cards ×1000. 【ACT】 [(1) Put this card into your waiting room] Choose 1 "Calamity-Class Charybdis" in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavorText: I'll show that impertinent Demon Lord Milim...

name: Loyal Subordinate, Soka
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a 《Demon Continent》 character, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +2000 power until end of turn. (Return the revealed card to its original place) 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may choose 1 《Demon Continent》 character in your waiting room and the bottom card of your clock, and exchange them.
flavorText: Understood. Leave the rest to us.

name: Victory Celebration, Souei
text: 【AUTO】 At the beginning of your climax phase, choose 1 of your 《Demon Continent》 characters, and that character gets the following ability until end of turn. "【CONT】 This card gets +X power. X is equal to this card's soul ×1500." 【ACT】 [(2) 【REST】 this card] Choose 1 of your opponent's characters, and return it to their hand. 【ACT】 [(1) 【REST】 this card] Choose 1 of your opponent's characters, and that character gets -1 level until end of turn.

name: "Beastmaster" Carrion
text: 【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 ""Beastmaster" Carrion" in your waiting room, and return it to your hand. 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if this card's battle opponent is cost 0 or lower, you may put that character at the bottom of your opponent's deck.
flavorText: I swear on my name to never raise a blade to your nation.

name: Precise Instructions, Gabiru
text: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, this card gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of other 《Demon Continent》 characters you have ×1000. 【AUTO】 Encore [Put 1 《Demon Continent》 character from your hand into your waiting room] (When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return this card to its previous stage position as 【REST】)
flavorText: Tend to the wounded!

name: Fruits of Wisdom
text: Put this card into your memory. Reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is an event or a 《Demon Continent》 character, put it into your hand. (Otherwise, return it to its original place) 【CONT】 Memory During your turn, if this card is in your memory, all of your 《Demon Continent》 characters get +500 power.
flavorText: Yuuki: "Understood! Thank you, Master!"

name: Coincidental Meeting With the Future
text: Choose 2 cards in your level, return them to your hand, choose 2 cards in your hand or waiting room, and put them into your level in any order.
flavorText: Rimuru: "What the…"

name: Conqueror of Flames
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【DRAW】: When this card triggers, you may draw 1 card)

name: I'm Not a Bad Slime!
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【GATE】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 climax in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)

name: Shadow Squad
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on your climax area from your hand, choose up to 1 character with level equal to or lower than your level in your waiting room, return it to your hand, choose up to 2 of your characters, and those characters get +1 soul until end of turn.

name: Great Combination!
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【DRAW】: When this card triggers, you may draw 1 card)

name: "Orc Lord" Strategy Meeting
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【GATE】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 climax in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)

name: Petit Shion
text: 【CONT】 If you have another level 3 or higher character, this card gets +4000 power. 【CONT】 If you have 2 or more other 《Demon Continent》 characters, this card gets +3000 power.

name: Petit Rimuru
text: 【AUTO】 [(1)] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to 1 "Petit Rimuru", put it on any position of your stage, and shuffle your deck.

name: Petit Milim
text: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, choose 1 of your other 《Demon Continent》 characters, and that character gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of other 《Demon Continent》 characters you have ×500.

name: Petit Shuna
text: 【AUTO】 When your other character becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +2000 power until end of turn. 【ACT】 Brainstorm [(1)] Flip over 4 cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. For each climax revealed among those cards, perform the following action. "Choose 1 character in your waiting room, return it to your hand, choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room."

name: Petit Shizu
text: 【AUTO】 When damage dealt by this card is not canceled, this card gets +6000 power until end of turn.

name: Anti-Magic Mask
text: Search your deck for up to 1 《Demon Continent》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck. Put this card into your memory.
flavorText: Black: "Impossible! That mask... That time compression…"

name: Nostalgic Form, Rimuru
text: 【AUTO】 This ability activates up to 1 time per turn. When you use an 【ACT】, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn. 【ACT】 [【REST】 this card] Choose 1 of your 《Demon Continent》 characters, and that character gets +500 power until the end of your opponent's next turn.
